/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, teeming with cars and buses, cuts through the heart of the city, while buildings of various sizes and designs flank it on both sides. The sky above is overcast, casting a muted light over the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, reflecting the urban environment and the presence of trees lining the street. The perspective of the image gives a sense of depth and scale, emphasizing the vastness of the city and the constant movement of its inhabitants.
